verses.verse: Howbeit <S%H199><s%>, <S%H347>Job<s%>, I pray <S%H8085>thee<s%>, hear my <S%H4405>speech<s%>, And <S%H238>hearken<s%> to all my <S%H1697>words<s%>.
Behold <S%H6605>now<s%>, I have opened my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in my <S%H2441>mouth<s%>.
My <S%H561>words<s%> shall utter the <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%>; And that which my <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1847>know<s%> they shall <S%H4448>speak<s%> <S%H1305>sincerely<s%>.
The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> hath <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5397>me<s%>, And the breath of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> giveth me <S%H2421>life<s%>.
If thou <S%H3201>canst<s%>, <S%H7725>answer<s%> thou <S%H6186>me<s%>; Set thy words in order <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3320>me<s%>, stand forth.
Behold <S%H410><s%>, I am toward God even as thou <S%H6310>art<s%>: I also am <S%H7169>formed<s%> out of the <S%H2563>clay<s%>.
Behold <S%H367><s%>, my terror shall not make thee <S%H1204>afraid<s%>, Neither shall my <S%H405>pressure<s%> be heavy upon <S%H3513>thee<s%>.
Surely thou hast <S%H559>spoken<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing<s%>, And I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thy <S%H4405>words<s%>, saying,
I am <S%H2134>clean<s%>, without <S%H6588>transgression<s%>; I am <S%H2643>innocent<s%>, neither is there iniquity in <S%H5771>me<s%>:
Behold <S%H4672><s%>, he findeth <S%H8569>occasions<s%> against <S%H2803>me<s%>, He counteth me for his <S%H341>enemy<s%>:
He <S%H7760>putteth<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H5465>stocks<s%>, He <S%H8104>marketh<s%> all my <S%H734>paths<s%>.
Behold <S%H6030><s%>, I will answer <S%H6663>thee<s%>, in this thou art not just; For <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H7235>greater<s%> than <S%H582>man<s%>.
Why dost thou <S%H7378>strive<s%> against <S%H6030>him<s%>, For that he giveth not account of any of his <S%H1697>matters<s%>?
For <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H259>once<s%>, Yea <S%H8147>twice<s%>, though man regardeth it <S%H7789>not<s%>.

In a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, in a <S%H2384>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%>, When <S%H8639>deep<s%> sleep <S%H5307>falleth<s%> upon <S%H582>men<s%>, In <S%H8572>slumberings<s%> upon the <S%H4904>bed<s%>;
Then he <S%H1540>openeth<s%> the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%>, And <S%H2856>sealeth<s%> their <S%H4561>instruction<s%>,
That he may <S%H5493>withdraw<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> from his <S%H4639>purpose<s%>, And <S%H3680>hide<s%> <S%H1466>pride<s%> from <S%H1397>man<s%>;
He keepeth <S%H2820>back<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, And his <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H5674>perishing<s%> by the <S%H7973>sword<s%>.
He is <S%H3198>chastened<s%> also with <S%H4341>pain<s%> upon his <S%H4904>bed<s%>, And with <S%H7230>continual<s%> <S%H386>strife<s%> in his <S%H6106>bones<s%>;
So that his <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H2092>abhorreth<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, And his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8378>dainty<s%> <S%H3978>food<s%>.
His <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is consumed <S%H3615>away<s%>, that it cannot be <S%H7210>seen<s%>; And his <S%H6106>bones<s%> that were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> stick <S%H8192>out<s%>.
Yea <S%H5315><s%>, his soul draweth <S%H7126>near<s%> unto the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, And his <S%H2416>life<s%> to the <S%H4191>destroyers<s%>.

If <S%H3426>there<s%> be with him an <S%H4397>angel<s%>, An <S%H3887>interpreter<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> among a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, To <S%H5046>show<s%> unto <S%H120>man<s%> what is right for <S%H3476>him<s%>;
Then God is <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, and saith, <S%H6308>Deliver<s%> him from going <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, I have <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%>.
His <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall be <S%H7375>fresher<s%> than a <S%H5290>child<s%>'s; He <S%H7725>returneth<s%> to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5934>youth<s%>.

He <S%H6279>prayeth<s%> unto <S%H433>God<s%>, and he is <S%H7521>favorable<s%> unto <S%H7200>him<s%>, So that he seeth his <S%H6440>face<s%> with <S%H8643>joy<s%>: And he <S%H7725>restoreth<s%> unto <S%H582>man<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
He <S%H7789>singeth<s%> before <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H559>saith<s%>, I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and <S%H5753>perverted<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%>, And it profited me <S%H7737>not<s%>:
He hath <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H5674>going<s%> into the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, And my <S%H2416>life<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%>.
Lo <S%H410><s%>, all these things doth God <S%H6466>work<s%>, <S%H6471>Twice<s%>, yea thrice, with a <S%H1397>man<s%>,
To bring <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, That he may be <S%H215>enlightened<s%> with the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.
Mark <S%H7181>well<s%>, O <S%H347>Job<s%>, <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto <S%H2790>me<s%>: Hold thy peace, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
If thou <S%H3426>hast<s%> anything to <S%H4405>say<s%>, <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H4405>me<s%>: Speak, for I <S%H2654>desire<s%> to justify <S%H6663>thee<s%>.
If <S%H8085>not<s%>, hearken thou unto <S%H2790>me<s%>: Hold thy peace, and I will <S%H502>teach<s%> thee <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
